raw_data.description: River Thames from Shepperton to Molesey

floodArea.county: Greater London, Richmond upon Thames, Surrey

raw_data.message:
High river levels today may lead to flooding.

Flooding is possible on 06 February 2026.

Flooding of low lying land and roads is exoected to continue, especially in the Sunbury and Molesey areas. Further heavy rainfall is forecast over the next 24 hours. We expect river levels to continue slowly rising as water moves downstream and levels will remain high over the next few days.

We are closely monitoring the situation. 

Avoid using low lying footpaths and any bridges near local watercourses. Take care and avoid walking, cycling or driving through flood water.

This message will be updated by 20:00 on 07 February 2026 or as the situation changes.
